description: Radio button represents an item of a single selection list. It is a part of RadioGroup or can be used to recreate it.

featureExamples.title: Structure
featureExamples.description: Radio button consists of a radio itself and a label on the side.

featureExamples.title: States
featureExamples.description: Radio button has three states - `default`, `checked` and `disabled`.

featureExamples.title: Label
featureExamples.description: Label value accepts `node` or `string` based values. It is recommended to use `string` as it complies with design systems typography.

featureExamples.title: Alignment
featureExamples.description: Radio is vertically centered to its label by default. Items can be aligned to the top with alignItems prop.

featureExamples.title: Advanced Example
featureExamples.description: Radio can be used to recreate Radio Group.

featureExamples.title: Advanced Example
featureExamples.description: Radio can be used to build custom selection lists.
